item.title: Use a Parameter to Swap Sheets in Tableau
item.description: How to use a parameter in Tableau to swap between sheets

item.title: Useful Tableau Calculations
item.description: Dates Max Date MONTH([Date]) = MONTH({ FIXED : MAX([Date])}) Max Date where values is not null or 0 [Date] = { FIXED : MAX(IF [Actual Miles] <> 0 THEN [Date] END)} Get previous date using max date { FIXED : MAX(IF [Max Date] = FALSE THEN [Date] END) } Get previous value using previous date IF [Date] = [Previous Date] THEN [MPG] ELSE 0 END Get current value using max date
